sen.j: 坂東曲（ばんどうぶし）とは、真宗大谷派の法要・報恩講でなされる行事。
sen.e: Bando-bushi is an event taking place at Buddhist memorial services and Hoon-ko (memorial services for Shinran) in Otani school of the Shinshu Sect.

sen.j: 僧侶が上体を揺らして念仏や和讃を唱える。
sen.e: At the event, Buddhist priests chant invocations and hymns by shaking their upper bodies.

sen.j: 親鸞が越後へ流罪になる際、荒波に揺れる船の中で一心に念仏を唱えた話に由来する。
sen.e: This event is originated from an anecdote of Shinran when he was exiled to Echigo (currently Niigata Prefecture), he chanted intently in a ship which weltered heavily by rough sea.
This event originated from an anecdote of Shinran that when he was transported to Echigo (currently Niigata Prefecture), he chanted intently in a ship which weltered heavily in a rough sea.

sen.j: 他の浄土真宗宗派では見られない大谷派独特のもの。
sen.e: This is a unique characteristic of Otani school in which there is no similar event in other schools of the Jodo Shinshu (the True Pure Land Sect of Buddhistm).
